name: Lazer Swarm
description:
Alone above an alien planet. Lightyears from the nearest civilised colony. Nothing between you and the swarm of bugs but a few centimeters of alumasteel and an itchy trigger finger.

Welcome to Lazer Swarm.

Lazer Swarm is a top down, fast paced shooter, with an objective of killing as many bugships as possible and getting a higher score. Use WASD to move, the mouse to aim and shoot, and R to restart.

This is the first game I have developed, mostly as a learning experience, using the Construct 2 engine.

In-game music by Bensound
